slides.title: Program Overview
slides.body: Welcome to AADA’s Dental Assistant Certificate Program. You’ll learn professionalism, HIPAA/OSHA essentials, communication, and student policies aligned to Georgia GNPEC.
slides.voiceOver: [TTS] Welcome to AADA's Dental Assistant Certificate Program.

slides.title: Meet Your Instructors
slides.body: Your licensed dental professionals will coach you; unaccredited programs require live, meaningful interaction per GNPEC.
slides.voiceOver: [TTS] Let's meet your faculty and review live interaction expectations.

activities.intro: Professionalism & Ethics — choose the best action for each scenario.

branches.situation: Coworker violates HIPAA (PHI visible on monitor). What do you do?

options.label: Report to supervisor and secure PHI
options.feedback: Correct—reporting suspected breaches supports patient privacy and Georgia clinic policies.

options.label: Ignore; not your responsibility
options.feedback: Not acceptable; patient privacy is everyone’s responsibility.

hotspots.feedback: Always protect PHI from public view per HIPAA minimum necessary standard.

pairs.definition: Prorated before 50% completion; refund within 45 days; only certain fees nonrefundable.
Full refund within 72 hours of signing (less nonrefundable fees).
Internal process; right to appeal to GNPEC with agency contact provided.
